job description:
Bioinformatics Scientist
If you are a Bioniformatics Scientist with experience, please read on!

What You Will Be Doing
The successful candidate will work collaboratively with biologists, statisticians and clinical scientists to analyze immune monitoring data from clinical studies, perform cross-platform data analysis and integration with clinical data to identify biomarkers for patient stratification, clinical response and

Develop and implement tools for the analysis of large-scale, multiparametric immune monitoring data obtained from genomic, transcriptomic and proteomic platforms
Perform cross-platform data integration
Develop and implement tools for data visualization
Support immune monitoring data analysis needs
Document study design, methods and results in a meticulous and compliant manner
Organize and present results concisely at regular team and cross-functional meetings
Liaise with Biometrics, Statistics, Clinical Science and Data Management teams to integrate immune monitoring with clinical data

What You Need for this Position
At Least 1 Year of experience and knowledge of:

Strong programming skills in Python, R and SQL are required
Experience in statistical packages (R/SAS) is desirable
Experience with visualization and pathway analysis software (IPA, CytoSCAPE, DAVID) are required
Experience in the analysis of next-generation sequencing and microarray data
Experience in developing and implementing algorithms to support clinical or biomedical R&D
Bioinformatics expertise in in immunology or cancer biology is highly desirable.
At least one year of experience in the biotech industry is required
Experience in documentation of methods, analysis plans and results in a GxP compliant manner is a plus

PhD degree in Computational Biology, Statistics, Biostatistics, Computer Science or Bioinformatics, with at least 1 year experience in the biotech industry
Demonstrated ability to interrogate large biological data sets, preferably using human biologic data, and to address focused biological questions
Ability to work independently and within a dynamic team environment

So, if you are a Bioniformatics Scientist with experience, please apply today!
